original_title: New laws being drafted to replace PTA – President
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – President Ranil Wickremesinghe stated that laws are being formulated to introduce a new act to replace the Prevention of Terrorism Act, as well as to establish a Truth and Reconciliation Commission.
The Head of State was speaking at a virtual discussion with Harvard University.
